author: ralexstokes
content:
reposting action items:

**Action items**

* Pectra timelines
  * Mainnet date confirmed to be May 7 2025
  * Client releases by April 21 2025
  * Pectra mainnet blog post by April 23 2025
* Add contacts per client team for Pectra mainnet observation
   * https://github.com/ethereum/pm/blob/master/Pectra/pectra-mainnet-plan.md#client-team-coordinators
* Fusaka SFI EIPs
   * EIP-7594 (PeerDAS)
   * EIP-7892 (BPO)
* Fusaka CFI EIPs
   * EIP-7917 (Proposer lookahead stability)
* Other PFI Fusaka EIPs are moved to DFI status.
